content:
That sounds like a great outfit idea! Pairing the long-sleeved shirt with black leggings and Adidas sneakers will create a comfortable and chic look that's perfect for a casual day out. The simple necklace and beanie will add a nice touch of elegance and polish to the overall look.

I'm glad I could help! Remember, the key to pulling off a great outfit is to feel confident and comfortable in what you're wearing. You've got this!

If you have any more questions or need further styling advice, feel free to ask. Otherwise, go out there and rock that outfit!
